class SXF_ElemBucketRegistry

Interface

Public Members
virtual ~SXF_ElemBucketRegistry()
SXF_ElemBucket* getBucket(const char* type)
SXF_ElemBucket* getErrorBucket()
Protected Members
SXF_ElemBucketRegistry(SXF_OStream& out)
SXF_ElemBucket* bind(const char* name, SXF_ElemBucket* bucket)
virtual int hash(const char* type) const
void allocateRegistry()

Description

The ElemBucketRegistry class represents a collection of element buckets common to all element types (such as exit, entry, align, and others). Registry must supply also an error element bucket reader that is invoked when there is no appropriate reader.

Member Description

virtual ~SXF_ElemBucketRegistry()

Destructor.

SXF_ElemBucket* getBucket(const char* type)

Return a bucket reader. e.g. getBucket("aperture").

SXF_ElemBucket* getErrorBucket()

Return an error element bucket reader.

SXF_ElemBucketRegistry(SXF_OStream& out)

Constructor(s)

SXF_ElemBucket* bind(const char* name, SXF_ElemBucket* bucket)

Register a particular bucket reader. e.g. bindBucket("aperture", new _SXF_ElemAperture())

virtual int hash(const char* type) const

Map bucket types to their indecies in the array of bucket readers.

void allocateRegistry()

Allocate an array of element bucket readers.
